name: opabf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbir(wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), emptycls), wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(w0))))

body.origin:
|- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), emptycls)
-| wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), emptycls), wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), emptycls)
-| wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), emptycls), wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(w0))))

|- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), emptycls)
-| wb(wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), emptycls), wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(w0))))
-| wn(w0)

body.origin: |- wb(wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), emptycls), wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(w0))))

comment: A class abstraction of a collection of ordered pairs with a negated wff is the empty set. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 21-Oct-2019.) (Proof shortened by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Feb-2022.)
